privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.section1Intro: AgentMarket (hereinafter "the Company") processes personal information for the following purposes:
privacy.section2Auto: Automatically collected: IP address, cookies, service usage logs, access logs
privacy.section2Ai: AI Chat Data: Conversations with AI agents (for service quality improvement)
privacy.section3p1: â‘  Personal data is destroyed immediately upon account deletion.
privacy.section3p2: â‘¡ However, data may be retained as required by applicable laws:
privacy.section3p3: â‘¢ AI chat data is retained for up to 1 year, then anonymized.
